title: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent Java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB: The file is saved with a generic file extension. When opened, it is treated as a text file.
EB: The file should be saved with the same extension as the original unless explicitly changed.
SR:
1. Open the Java file.
2. Click on 'Save As'.
3. Choose a different location to save the file.
4. Check that the file is saved with the correct extension.
